name: Tkemali (Plum Sauce)
description: If you can find tart green plums, they are best for this dish. Otherwise, use unripened red plums.
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons or more of lemon juice, depending on tartness of plums

recipeInstructions.text: Place the plums in a medium saucepan and cover with water. Simmer until the plums are soft, about 10 minutes, depending on their size. Drain, pit and sieve. Return the plums to the saucepan.
To the saucepan add the garlic, coriander, dill, hot pepper and lemon. Bring to a boil and cook about two minutes. Remove from the heat and allow to cool. Serve with shashlik or roast chicken.
